website_summaries.verdict: Master Lock has been a trusted name in locks for generations, and this affordable model is no exception. Its popular design and craftsmanship make it the best value.
pros: Classic discus design with limited shackled exposure offers added protection from tampering
Solid build is suited for a wide variety of uses, indoors and outdoors
cons: The opening won't work with very thick items that require a wider shackle
A few consumers didn't receive 2 keys as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Not for use outside in the winter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these locks for my Stealth trailer. The lock has a small drain hole at the bottom of the lock to let moisture out, but as shown in the picture the trailer requires the locks to be sideways. Since it cannot drain in the sideways position, water collects inside the lock and freezes making it impossible to open the lock with the key. Fortunately nothing inside the lock warped. It was a sunny winter day when I needed to get in the trailer and a bucket of warm water was enough to thaw out the locks. I'm confident this could happen regardless of lock position when cold given how easily water can get inside the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: Last summer, someone attempted to break into my drive up storage unit. I purchased this pair because I needed two new locks. Unfortunately one of the locks rusted in two spots within three months of use. I am so bummed! Looks like I am going to have to look into a better lock for outside use.
customer_reviews.author: RF game play

customer_reviews.title: Working with the manufacturer on my issue
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the WORST purchase I ever made on Amazon in 15+ years. The lock stopped opening after TWO -- yes TWO -- uses. Amazon was great in processing the return for the lock, but the real reason to stay away from this item is that now I will have to pay a LOCKSMITH to cut off the lock from my storage unit. So this lock will end up costing me way more than the purchase price. So, if/when it stops working, you could be out even more $$$ just to get your lock removed from wherever you were using it!!! The warranty does not cover cost of a locksmith. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: K. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pod Lock
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lock to secure a Pod and this works perfectly with their system for s fraction of what they charge. It’s sturdy and when locked it is not possible to access the mechanism to cut off the lock.
customer_reviews.author: eclectickidc

customer_reviews.title: I used to really enjoy Amazon prime
customer_reviews.text: Locks came as open box items missing keys, so completely unusable. Not only that, but when trying to process return I was notified it would take two weeks, and I would be getting refunded via Amazon gift card. I paid with credit card. Not amused, after wasting 15 minutes on the phone with customer service I gave up. I used to really enjoy Amazon prime, but lately I'm better off stopping at the store where I know I'm actually getting new product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done at CubeSmart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock to use at CubeSmart self storage in Tucson AZ. It's cheaper than what they sell at the office, while offering the same level of protection. The lock comes with only two keys. I kept one for myself and left one with a classmate, so that he could retrieve my stuff in case I couldn't return to the city. I wish there's a third key that I can give to the storage facility manager for receiving packages. Arizona law prohibits the manager from releasing the key to anyone other than myself, so the second key has to be left with my classmate.
customer_reviews.author: yoursunny

customer_reviews.title: Simple, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Great lock if you don’t want anyone (including yourself) to ever be able to access your belongings. After two months of it being on the door and being used all of four times, the lock was struggling to open. During my attempts to open it the key broke off in the lock. Feeling like Hercules over here, but pissed off ar this garbage product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: Looks Well-Made and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is quite a sturdy lock. To open, insert the provided key and turn. To lock, you have to use the key. The lock is constructed such that it is very hard to get a pair of bolt cutters over the shackle to cut it. That being said, if what you're attaching your lock to is the weak point, then having a good lock defeats the purpose. It also looks hardened to striking attacks with a hammer . The small opening of the area under the shackel also means it will be hard to get a crowbar in for prying
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Took the first lock of the three out of the abominable plastic bubble and immediately and without warning sliced my thumb open on the sharp edge of the lock at the top of of the case which had not been ground down by the manufacturer. After band aid treatment I looked at each lock and found that each one has edges sharp enough to cut you. I will have to grind off those edges before I can use them to prevent future cuts. Be warned. Also, you get three locks but only two keys. I'll have a new key made.
customer_reviews.author: No Longer Amused

customer_reviews.title: Fake and cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake replica definitely not a Master Lock don't buy it honestly just go to Home Depot and get a real master lock this is some Chinese crap
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuyFromFl

customer_reviews.title: Do not use for cargo trailer doors!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is junk. It seized up in cold weather and the flimsy key it came with ended up breaking off inside. I had to use a grinder to cut the lock off my trailer door. Apparently another person just left a review describing the same issue, where water collects and freezes when placed sideways on a cargo trailer door. Not a good lock for use on a cargo trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Impressively sturdy, and bolt cutters can't attack this!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a shed with a good (other type) of padlock was silently attacked by a monster with bolt cutters, I really needed an easy solution to outfox the "bad guys." A friend told me that this type of super heavy steel padlock left absolutely (almost) no way for a roving bad guy looking for an easy target to get at it. It's a good but tight fit into my shed's mechanism, but easy enough to remove for access. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: madeleine gallay

customer_reviews.title: Very Secure
customer_reviews.text: Work very well at storage facilities. Someone tried to cut one off of my space and had no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Albert R Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Locked tight, then failed.
customer_reviews.text: To update this review, the lock has ceased to function after 9 months of frequent use. The key will no longer turn, lock has been lubricated per masterlock website and still no luck. Will have to try and warranty the lock while purchasing a replacement to keep the trailer locked up. (update to review 07/2018) Masterlock quality to go with a blaylock trailer hitch lock. (review when purchased 10/2017)
customer_reviews.author: MRLaw

customer_reviews.title: Best lock for storage unit
customer_reviews.text: The lock has been on my outside storage unit for months through all kinds of rain and no sigh of rust or water in the lock. Good lock, Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: Not as smooth as the older model
customer_reviews.text: The current Master 40 lock is not as refined as the older model (from 10 years ago) and the mechanism does not operate as smoothly as the older lock, but still acceptably. The new and old locks are within .3 oz in weight of each other, with the heavier being the older lock, which appears to have a slightly thicker stainless case, but very close. I will be pleased if the new lock lasts as long as the old lock which is at 10 years without any sign of quitting.
customer_reviews.author: Project Manager

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my enclosed car trailer. I live in Wisconsin so the only thing I can say bad about them is that they will freeze in the winter if they are not hanging perfectly straight. On my trailer they hang sideways so the water can lay inside the lock. I wish Master Lock would put two more holes on the sides for drainage for this application. Still very good quality lock. I've had another set on my other trailer for over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Haw

customer_reviews.title: quality and security
customer_reviews.text: the lock was just like it was advertised. master lock has always had a reputation for quality and this lock performed. It slides easily in and out and fits the holes in the storage unit to make it work for storage facilities. had another cheaper lock on a facility and the unit has broken into twice. they used a saw. this one looks like it will hold up in the weather also. makes me feel more secure
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Sazama

customer_reviews.title: Have WD-40 on hand if it gets wet.
customer_reviews.text: I hate thieves so I welded on some tabs to my roof top tent and roof rack and used this lock. First night out (in the desert) it rained. Headed back the next day and when I went to remove the lock the keyhole was completely frozen, as in break the key off in it if you twisted any harder. I doused it with WD-40 and after a couple minutes and some finagling with the key I was able to get it opened. PS that was the first time in my entire life (50 years) that I used “finagling” in a typed sentence.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected on storage door
customer_reviews.text: Used for a storage unit worked as expected. Recommended lock from the storage location but they were charge 2x this price. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and great
customer_reviews.text: I have neighbors that broke into my storage unit in the apartment building all the time by breaking my locks, but after I bought this, I haven't had to replace the lock! It's HUGE and fantastic. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Betzaida Rueda

customer_reviews.title: Keyed Alike Locks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these locks to secure 2 shipping containers during move from Florida to Maine. The locks being keyed alike was a big plus since I didn't have to keep track of 2 different sets of keys. Solid and secure locks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NavySpy

customer_reviews.title: You need this lock
customer_reviews.text: We used for ou pod containers for our move cross country. Sturdy and perfect for the job. This is the type of lock you need for a storage facility. Had no issues and a plus that you get two locks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Moving?  Worry about one less thing
customer_reviews.text: Keyed alike locks were brilliant as we sold two homes and had to declutter for showing and eventual move. This made accessing our Pods seamless, no matter where either of us was, and at final delivery we also had convenience of not matching key to Pod/lock. Would do it all again (minus moving, which is always a drag).
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand the good reviews for this lock. Evidently the quality control must have changed in the last couple of months. Shackle is a poor fit and rattles within the housing. The housing is obviously stamped. This is not a master built quality lock.
customer_reviews.author: Disco in Myrtle Beach

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Lock - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Terrific lock for the price! I used this on vacation to lock up the trailer that I was towing. It got some sand in the mechanism, but still worked like a charm - no issues at all. And, it's major sturdy - if somebody wanted to break it off with a sledge hammer, I'm pretty sure they could do it eventually. But the ruckus it would create to pound it off would be enough to catch somebody's attention. Love it - will use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Denisimo Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality; decent price for 3 same-key storage locks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent disk locks all keyed the same perfect for storage lockers and my trailer. The only reason they do not have a 5 star rating is that I needed to lubricate with some garage door oil to make them turn super easy. If you do this before using the locks, you will be pleased with the quality and turn ability of the keys.
customer_reviews.author: LillyView

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty locks
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a storage facility. Super heavy and durable. Harder for people to cut off lockers. I felt very safe with these. Super heavy duty and a couple dollars cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe, Sound & Secure
customer_reviews.text: This lock is a perfect fit for my CubeSmart storage locker. I have one of the medium size storage (I believe 10 x 15) so instead of buying a lock there, I ventured online. Come to find out CubeSmart apparently likes the locks as well since they sell them in their facility. The lock itself is heavy, but not too heavy and it feels sturdy and secure. I haven't had any issues with the key or locking and unlocking and I like the lock enough to feel safe and secure about it storing my things. Good buy, great price!
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good lock, poor key
customer_reviews.text: Key broke off in lock on first use. The lock itself may be fine but the key was thin and flimsy. Amazon was fabulous about crediting me for the purchase, but it meant my storage unit wasn't secured for a day while I purchased a new one at a brick-and-mortar. As for the lock design, it did fit the contraption on my storage unit very well. It took the maintenance guy a good bit of elbow grease and a grinder to get it off, so hopefully thieves wouldn't put in that much effort. If the key quality improves, this would be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: greenbeancounter

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all...Master Lock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock for our PODS storage unit because the Sales Rep stated these were the most secure. When they delivered our PODS, the delivery guy indicated this was the best lock on the market because bolt cutters can't be used to pry open. The keys were easy to use and it has served its purpose for us. I hope the Sales Rep and Delivery Guy are both right and we can get our items out of storage without incident. Not sure if the price was more or less expensive than local stores, but Amazon Prime shipped it to and that removes the hassle of me driving to the store.
customer_reviews.author: R. McLaren

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy lock that I use for my shed. I wanted something that would pose a challenge to anyone trying to get into my shed. Someone tried to break in and this lock held up well. The would be thief was unsuccessful. The shape makes it hard for someone to cut. It has a good weight to it and does not feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: good lock you cannot even open it with key
customer_reviews.text: idea is good but the lock stock inside and wont move , specially if you try to lock it in tight hood , even a little pressure stops it , the lock can be moved back and force by hand I wont recommend it as main lock
customer_reviews.author: Majid

customer_reviews.title: Only recommended for vertical applications
customer_reviews.text: Unless they are hanging straight down, these locks fill with water and rust.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: They get water in them very easily. It’s very difficult to turn the key to unlock them. I broke a key off the first time. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: slc

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: No one is going to cut these off. Very good design. The only thing to mention is, the bolt that goes through your latch is thicker than most locks so you will need a larger hole to be able to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusts internally - not suitable for wet locations
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the nice stainless steel shroud fool you - if you are going to use this in a wet location you need to choose something else. The internals on the lock rust and freeze it shut. I purchased a 3-pack to secure some cargo trailers and have already had to cut one off and the other two are barely functional.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Nice locking protection
customer_reviews.text: Locks are good just didn’t function real well right out of the box. I put a few drops of 3 in 1 oil inside them and made lots of difference. Now they are easy to turn key and latch
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. King

customer_reviews.title: Solid and great for storage lockers
customer_reviews.text: Solid and great for storage lockers. I needed a lock for my Public Storage locker. They provide locks as part of their monthly fee, but we added this product to ease any paranoia. The positioning of the actual lock makes it slightly more difficult for a bolt cutter, although I'm sure anything is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones the storage units sell you. Both locks are keyed the same. Comes w only 1 key per lock, which is the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: HelloHappyOne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit Uhaul trucks. Otherwise decent lock
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Uhaul truck. Doesn’t fit the stupid truck lock hole though. Lock itself didn’t seem very secure but seemed to function well enough. Hopefully will find a use for it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Danner

customer_reviews.title: Master Discus Padlock design a real winner against criminals that like Bull Cutters.
customer_reviews.text: These Masterlock Discus padlock design locks are great to deter criminals. They are made of durable steel and based on design doesnt facilitate bull cutter intrusion and destruction. Great price and effective. Only issue might be getting your chain to fit in the locks opening and locking it in.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Stupak

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lock
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy by a brand that doesn't dissappoints. This lock should last a real long time. Good purchase, perfect for storage units inside or outside environments.
customer_reviews.author: ADYO

customer_reviews.title: Work well however will rust if exposed to the elements
customer_reviews.text: Work well however will rust if exposed to the elements
customer_reviews.author: BTan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storage units
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock for an interior climate controlled storage unit while I was traveling and in between apartments. I felt safe with the lock on my storage unit and found it easy to use. Occasionally I have to give the key a slight jiggle to get the latch to move, but overall it works just fine and offers decent security. Some reviewers seem to have issues for regular use/outdoor use. For the price point it seems great for a storage unit you don't access to frequently and don't need climate control. The price is reasonable for the protection and function.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the Locks
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to. They lock and are well built.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: These are great. One caution though, keep them lubed a little with some spray silicone if you're going to use them in an outdoor setting and they'll keep working forever. (or use WD-40). They're Master Locks. Say no more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a lock
customer_reviews.text: The key opens the lock. Needed for a storage unit. Nobody cut the lock off and the key opened the lock each time I opened the storage unit. Perfect track record!
customer_reviews.author: KNBishop

customer_reviews.title: The key alike feature was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our uhaul pods that were on our office lot for a month then shipped from Chicago to San Diego! They were in snow and rain yet didn't rust!
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Good locks
customer_reviews.text: Look like sturdy locks to me. I own and rent out self storage units and that is what I use these for.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Used these on my uhaul storage pod. Good security fit great, I feel like the lock could be compromised given the right tools thus 4 Stars. Manufacturing was rough with welds and conjunctions.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Opened package!
customer_reviews.text: The locks are “okay”. Bit smaller than I expected. Very disappointed that I was shipped a product that had the packaging cut open with the blister pack cut open on two sides! See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Coast-Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good lock for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I needed to put my household goods into storage for a month and the storage place wanted to charge an arm and a leg - this is just what I needed for a fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Lock for storage unit
customer_reviews.text: I saw these being sold at my storage unit for triple the price. I figured they had to be cheaper online. They were. It works fine. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to open - easy to close
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrating to be stressing with a lock that is so hard to open. I've three storage sheds with u locks. Never had this problem with the Brinks. $1 or $2 cheaper than the good locks. The lower price is unimportant because of the time it takes to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best lock on the market
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storage unit since the lock is designed so there is very little room for anyone to try and cut lock and break in. About 75% of every storage unit at our place uses these locks!
customer_reviews.author: N. Austin Gray

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These locks are very good quality and virtually tamper proof. Yes, they can be taken off but if someone goes through the effort of getting this bad boy off, they almost deserve congratulations. Heavy and made to last forever, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: I. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: May not fit a standard storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not work for the storage unit I rented which is a standard unit. It was just a tad too small unfortunately even though it looks just like the ones they sell:/
customer_reviews.author: Fdamanti

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace some slide pattern locks that would not work after a rain. These don't mind the rain one bit and work exactly like they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, cheaper than what is sold to you at rental places
customer_reviews.text: I recently rented a storage unit and was encouraged to purchase an onsite lock to secure my rental. I did want to do my due diligence however and began sourcing prices for padlocks. Almost immediately I realized that this deal was much better than any other I had seen around, and about 1/2 of the price of what the rental place wanted to charge me. This lock is very well made, and included 2 keys. I have used this style of lock on two separate rental units and this leads me to believe that this style of lock will work for most units. I have no complaints about this lock.
customer_reviews.author: RiSound

customer_reviews.title: Secure for locking up longboard
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to lock up my longboard on campus. Works well and is very secure
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Held up well over the winter and did not get terribly rusty.
customer_reviews.text: These disk locks are ok. I used ti as a back up on an outside storage unit to slow anyone done or make it not worth it to break in as it was 1 of 2 locks on the unit. It held up well over the winter and did not get terribly rusty. Turning the lock cylinder was a little rough, but it did sit outside all winter on the side of the building that gets the brunt of the weather. I would never use this lock as a primary the body of it is thin and not very hard. With the right tool it is easily defeated. Excellent 2nd lock though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Cheese

customer_reviews.title: Nice and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them, got them, and now they're just sitting in the garage collecting dust. I'll eventually use them someday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Well I got these for a outside building and they are rusting to the point I can not unlock them . Now they may have been something about them not being for outside but they rusted
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hayes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY & PROTECTION
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my PODS containers. The locking bar is very close to the lock itself, thus making it nearly impossible to bolt cut it off...which is perfect against would be thieves. I’m happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Quietstorm80

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy locks
customer_reviews.text: They had fallen out of the packaging during shipping, but the cardboard box kept them safe inside. Can't go wrong with these locks though. We shall see in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Sion Otter

customer_reviews.title: Got a dent on the lock and it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a pod. Once fully packed, the lock worked well. When the pod was received however, there was a dent on the lock and we couldn't fully open the lock. I didn't think the lock itself could get dented, but it did.
customer_reviews.author: MPFL

customer_reviews.title: Easily picked locks will very little security
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy locks but I was able to pick in like 5 sec. With a light touch my set could be zipped open. A rake made super short work.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Every storage locker needs
customer_reviews.text: Master Lock is the standard for locks and this is no different. Perfect for storage lockers, solid strength and easy open / close with a key.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Cafaro

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my work locker, unfortunately it doesnt fit, but I can still use it for plenty of other things that require a lock and key.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowKnightX4

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, smooth locking
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, strong, I’m a little scared the key is so thin I might break it one day, but I’m very happy with the lock
customer_reviews.author: ZdogZ

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my storage unit and It has been on my storage unit since August 2018. And there is already rust on it 5 months later. It still works so I can’t complain. It is definitely exposed daily to weather elements.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna

customer_reviews.title: Great locks for the money !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Two really cheap high quality padlocks. Was just what I needed at a really great price. I would highly recommend these locks for someone who needs a good lock at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Rtaylor8802

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have these on my enclosed trailer and they are very heavy duty. The locks collect rain if they are secured with the lock portion sideways, but doesn't seem to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MK Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great design to use with our baylock 5th wheel trailer lock. Feels sturdy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: A. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock
customer_reviews.text: I use this to lock up my shed. I predict someone would just rip off the doors before they attempted cutting off this lock. I know a lot of people use it for storage units too.
customer_reviews.author: Utkevdawg

customer_reviews.title: Rust resistance
customer_reviews.text: Rust resistance and sturdy this lock is everything you need for a outdoor gate lock!!
customer_reviews.author: Rich trabosh

customer_reviews.title: The type of lock lets me feel better that people can’t just use a pair of bolt ...
customer_reviews.text: This packet allows me to secure my entire trailer and have one key to open them all. The type of lock lets me feel better that people can’t just use a pair of bolt cutters to get them off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Works fair.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the greatest lock. We thought this style might work better than the standard style but it’s just adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Olson

customer_reviews.title: very stiff
customer_reviews.text: these are still difficult to open, slightly less to close despite oiling them. Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Milton P. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Great price and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bought for enclosed trailer and it was perfect functionality and price
customer_reviews.author: vanillagorilla

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for storage units. We had a lock get cut off. Replaced it with this and no more issues
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Works for my trailer and seem durable
customer_reviews.text: Not the best locks I’ve had compared to brinks but they work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: It makes me feel safer when I lock something with this lock.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this lock would be extra had for anyone trying to cut it off.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks sturdy and good deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Looks strong and a fine deterrent to thieves. Makes us look well fortified
customer_reviews.author: david david

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be very good locks.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, very high quality. I sprayed them down inside and out iwith light oil, since they are used on the back of the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good locks for price.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty Locks. Sometimes I have to jiggle key to open Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: CDK

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good lock. Being keyed the same is a nice feature. I’ve only one key to carry.
customer_reviews.author: BlackDawg440

customer_reviews.title: Master Lock 40DPF Stainless Steel Discus Padlock
customer_reviews.text: Using lock to secure a trailer lock. No problems thus far. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: What You Need for Storage Lockers
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to need to use a storage facility soon to store merchandise, and I've noticed this style of lock is sold at those facilities. I saw them here for such a great price, so I grabbed a couple. I couldn't be more satisfied with these locks. The shielded shackle is a great feature, and I love the size and weight of the locks.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D.

customer_reviews.title: Best bike lock!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and a tow chain as a bike lock. My bike ain't going anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy lock!
customer_reviews.text: Big bad ass lock. I had to drill out the hole onnmy garage to make it fit because it so heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Gaffield

customer_reviews.title: Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: These are just as described, I am using them on my storage unit and the uhaul I will be renting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem like good locks
customer_reviews.text: Seem like good locks. Not the most heavy duty but good. The problem is that the body of the lock fills up with water when it rains as these are on my tool trailer. Not an issue but winter is coming. I'm not going to be thawing locks out daily to get into my trailer so they will be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sardo

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different lock.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this was junk. The key broke off in the lock on the first day of use, so I can't recommend it. And the lock did not survive removal, so I couldn't return it. Somewhat surprised since Master Lock is usually a solid brand, but I can't recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh by the Sea

customer_reviews.title: Good for Uhaul trucks
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and strong. Fit the UHaul truck I got. Easy to open and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney P.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Last Long Outside
customer_reviews.text: Corroded after only about 2 years in an exposed location.
customer_reviews.author: DELee

customer_reviews.title: Blem locks????
customer_reviews.text: These locks feel like there coming apart when you open and close. Gonna need to have them send me out 2 more and if there the same, I will return them and back to the big box store. Its almost like there blems! Have 4 others that are fine from Lowe's. These 2 locks concern me!
customer_reviews.author: RONALD K HARTLEY

customer_reviews.title: Very secure
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, I used this on a storage unit. Saved me a ton to buy it from amazon rather than the storage company themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Hintz

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: as described, quick delivery, easy to use. very sturdy. work great with "The Collar" Trailer Hitch Lock for Bulldog-style Couplers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Master Lock 40DPF Stainless Steel Discus Padlock, 1 Pack, Silver
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackThe Master Lock No. 40DPF Discus Padlock features a 1-9/16in (70mm) wide stainless steel body for maximum strength, reliability and corrosion resistance. The fully shrouded design minimizes shackle exposure and protects against bolt cutter attacks. The 3/8in (10mm) diameter shackle is 5/8in (16mm) long and made of hardened steel, offering extra resistance to cutting and sawing. The 4-pin cylinder prevents picking and the dual locking levers provide resistance against prying and hammering. The Limited Lifetime Warranty provides peace of mind from a brand you can trust.
feature_bullets: For indoor and outdoor use; disc lock is best used as a storage lock and for garages, sheds, and trailers
Lock features stainless steel construction and hardened steel shackle for increased strength and security
4-pin cylinder and dual locking lever mechanism provides pick and pry resistance, shrouded design minimizes shackle exposure and protects against bolt cutter attacks
2-3/4 in. wide lock body; 3/8 in. diameter shackle with 5/8 in. length, 3/4 in. width
